sentences.english: Would you like to go on with the advance party, or wait here with the main group?
sentences.chinese: 你願意和先遣隊一塊先走，還是和大隊一起在這裏等？

sentences.english: Bill and Melinda will send their own advance team to look at logistics.
sentences.chinese: 比爾和梅琳達會先讓他們的先遣隊去看看後勤情況。

sentences.english: Blix and his initial team of 30 are now in Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 目前，Blix已帶領30名先遣隊員進入伊拉克。

sentences.english: You don't have to be a long-time spearhead to love these guys either.
sentences.chinese: 你不一定是喜歡這些人的長期的先遣隊。
